awd_titl_txt: Molecular Cloning of Gastric C1 Channels
awd_abstract_narration: This is a Career Advancement Award to support Dr. Malinowska's               proposed attempt to clone the gastric apical membrane chloride                  channel protein.  This is the channel which plays a major role in               the secretion of hydrochloric acid into the stomach by the parietal             cell.  Dr. Malinowska has a long-standing interest in the                       biochemistry and biophysics of parietal cell chloride secretion.                In order to clone the channel, Dr. Malinowska will have to acquire              new skills and expertise.                                                                                                                                       It is anticipated that the successful cloning of the parietal cell              chloride channel will lead to important new insights into the                   function and regulation of the channel, and will significantly                  enhance Dr. Malinowska's career.
org_div_long_name: Division of Molecular and Cellular Biosciences
